message: Hi Bob, I have a great product for you that I think you'll love. I'm offering it to you for $115.  Let me know if you're interested!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me there?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $100 is a good starting point, I'm looking for a bit more for this product.  How about we split the difference at $107.50? Let's make a deal!
I'm still interested in the product, but I can only go up to $105. Can you meet me there?
